name: Analyze Customer Behavior
title: Analyze Customer Behavior
task: Analyze customer behavior patterns from user interaction data.
goal: Identify trends and insights to improve customer experience and retention.
context: Customer analytics and business intelligence reporting.
details: Include segmentation analysis, funnel metrics, and actionable recommendations.

name: Create Data Dashboard
title: Create Data Dashboard
task: Design and build an interactive dashboard for key business metrics.
goal: Provide stakeholders with real-time visibility into business performance.
details: Include KPI selection, visualization best practices, and automated reporting.

name: Perform A/B Test Analysis
title: Perform A/B Test Analysis
task: Analyze results from an A/B test to determine statistical significance.
goal: Provide data-driven recommendations for product or marketing decisions.
details: Include statistical methods, confidence intervals, and business impact assessment.

name: Data Quality Assessment
title: Data Quality Assessment
task: Evaluate data quality and identify issues in datasets.
goal: Ensure data integrity and reliability for analysis and reporting.
context: Data governance and quality assurance processes.
details: Include completeness checks, accuracy validation, and remediation plans.

name: Predictive Model Development
title: Predictive Model Development
task: Develop a predictive model to forecast business outcomes.
goal: Enable proactive decision-making through data-driven predictions.
details: Include feature engineering, model selection, and validation techniques.
